ul.li: Only the Account Owner or Admin can upgrade a subscription.
Subscription upgrade does NOT require subscription cancellation.
The Upgrade button only appears when you have purchased at least one license. See Purchase Katalon License.

conbody.p: To add more licenses to your subscription, follow these steps:

ol.li: Log in to Katalon TestOps and select the desired Account.

li.p: In the Additional Subscription section, locate the license you want to purchase, then click option > Upgrade.

ul.li: You can only upgrade a single license type at a time.

li.p: In the checkout page, adjust the total number of licenses. Apply discount code, if any.
Fill in or update your billing information, then click Checkout.

conbody.p: Successful payment will immediately change your subscription.
